thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: Leite Joao is assigned to Food quality due to his work in nutrition and public health, while De Jong Beyhan's focus on the Farm to Fork strategy and bioeconomy makes him a suitable expert for this subtheme.

thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: Druon Jean-Noel's work on fisheries management and environmental dimension of fisheries, and Wollgast Jan's expertise in Health Promotion, make them suitable for Food quality - Animal Welfare.

thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: Leite Joao's background in nutrition and public health, and De Laurentiis Valeria's work in the Land Resources Unit, make them suitable experts for Food quality - Healthy Food.

thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: Catarino Rui and Guerrero Irene's work in the Food Security Unit make them suitable experts for Food affordability.

thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: Olvedy Michael's work on chemicals safety assessment and risk management, and Listorti Giulia's focus on soil biodiversity, make them suitable experts for Pesticides Reduction.

thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: De Jong Beyhan's work on the Farm to Fork strategy and bioeconomy, and Sanye Mengual Esther's focus on sustainable production and consumption, make them suitable experts for Competitive Agriculture.

thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: Puerta-PiÒero Carolina's work on direct payment administration and control processes, and Marelli Luisa's management activities in the Unit, make them suitable experts for Social Security - Workers Protection.
